alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 6:03AM AKST until January 23 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Freezing rain is possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, are expected. A light glaze of ice is possible. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...6 PM today to 6 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow today. Snow will increase tonight and continue into Sunday. Freezing rain is possible tonight and Saturday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
